https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ford_Mustang

The Ford Mustang is an iconic American automobile manufactured by Ford. First introduced on April 17, 1964, it is celebrated for its sporty design and performance, marking the beginning of the "pony car" class of American muscle cars. The Mustang has undergone numerous redesigns and updates over the decades, maintaining its popularity through its blend of style, power, and affordability. It has become a symbol of American automotive culture, with a rich history in motorsports and a strong presence in popular media. The Mustang's enduring appeal is attributed to its distinctive design, powerful engines, and nostalgic value, making it a beloved classic and modern vehicle.
